sqlMap.insert: insert into pointCategory(pointCategoryNum, memNum, nowPoint) values(seq_point.nextval, #memNum#, #nowPoint#)
insert into pointCategory(pointCategoryNum, memNum, transPoint) values(seq_point.nextval,#memNum#, #transPoint#)
sqlMap.select: select distinct SUM(nowPoint) OVER(partition by memNum ORDER BY memNum) allPoint from pointCategory where memNum = #memNum#
select distinct SUM(transPoint) OVER(partition by memNum ORDER BY memNum) resiPoint from pointCategory where memNum = #memNum#
